title: Suqqu The Cream Foundation (210) SPF25 PA++ 30g Japan
description: Product description: Sook The Cream Foundation 210 (30g) how to use: Take an appropriate amount and gently spread it from the center of the face to the outside. When using a foundation brush, take 1 to 2 pearls with a spatula and place 5 points on both cheeks, forehead, nose, and chin. Spread the foundation so that it is pulled outward from the center of the face with the brush surface. Apply a stamp on the sponge surface around the eyes, corners of the mouth, and nose, which are especially liable to collapse. [Estimated amount of use] Appropriate amount (1 to 2 pearls)
